definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

containing_words.word: 國防科學技術工業委員會

definition: China Defense Science and Technology Information Center (CDSTIC)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 fang2 Ke1 ji4 Xin4 xi1 Zhong1 xin1
containing_words.word: 中國國防科技信息中心

definition: modernization of national defense, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations

pinyin: Guo2 fang2 Yu3 yan2 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: This dissertation is an important part of the Tenth Five-year National defense preparatory Plan.
sentences.chinese: 本文是“十五”國防預研課題的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The Russian Defense Ministry dismissed claims of the airport bombing as disinformation .
sentences.chinese: 俄國防部指出關於轟炸機場的消息並不屬實。

sentences.english: To make defence education universal and foster such education is the common responsibility of the whole society.
sentences.chinese: 普及和加強國防教育是全社會的共同責任。

sentences.english: The project involves extensive cooperation with the Netherlands MoD’s C2 Support Centre.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃還包括與荷蘭國防部C2支持中心的廣泛協作。

sentences.english: Make sure this order is brought to the attention of all IDF soldiers".
sentences.chinese: 此令務必傳達全體以色列國防軍士兵。

sentences.english: US defence spending is levelling off and appears to be on the brink of a potentially significant downturn.
sentences.chinese: 美國國防預算正在下降並顯現出處在重大衰退的邊緣。

sentences.english: Deputy Secretary of Defense Lynn gave a speech on this issue just yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 國防部副部長林恩就在昨天圍繞這個問題發表了講話。

sentences.english: We will promote integrated military and civilian development, increase defense-related research, and strengthen the development of weapons and equipment.
sentences.chinese: 推動軍民融合式發展，加強國防科研和武器裝備建設。

sentences.english: This photo was taken by me at a Yacht club in Singapore, somewhere in Tanah Merah.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片是我在新加坡的國防部隊的假日營所拍的。

sentences.english: They took a leading part in the efforts to strengthen the national defense.
sentences.chinese: 他們在加強國防力量方面出了很大力。

sentences.english: And what's best is for Don Rumsfeld to remain as the Secretary of Defense,"-- Washington, April 18, 2006
sentences.chinese: 現在的‘最好’就是讓拉姆斯菲爾德續任國防部長。

sentences.english: Indian Defense Minister Arackaparambil Kurian Antony says that has ramifications on this side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 印度國防部長安東尼說，這些鎮壓對印度也有影響。

sentences.english: Hats-off to Russian defense inventions. u. s & chini just copy them.
sentences.chinese: 向俄羅斯的國防發明脫帽，中美只是複製他們。

sentences.english: To popularize and intensify the national defense education is the common responsibility of the whole society.
sentences.chinese: 普及和加強國防教育是全社會的共同責任。

sentences.english: Typically, defense contractors crank out just a few hundred armored vehicles a year.
sentences.chinese: 通常，國防承包商一年才造幾百輛裝甲車。

sentences.english: The GAO has more bad news for the Defense Department.
sentences.chinese: 美國審計局給國防部帶來了更多的壞消息。

definition: (political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
